product_name: Black Diamond Icon/Apollo NRG Rechargeable Battery Kit
long_description: What makes the powerful Black Diamond Icon headlamp and Apollo lantern even better? A rechargeable battery pack, wall charger and 4 power adapters! With this compact recharging kit, there's no hassling with single-use batteries, battery cradles or other odds and ends. Simply install the rechargeable NiMH battery and plug the wall charger into the headlamp or lantern. Battery power meter indicates the charging status; battery lasts for more than 2,000 charges (manufacturer's estimate). Travel at home and abroad with your Icon or Apollo; kit includes 3 European power adapters and 1 U.S. power adapter. Please note: NRG Rechargeable Battery kit does not work with the 2012 version of the Icon; it's compatible with the Apollo lantern and the Fall 2011 and older Icon headlamp.
